LanguageData.OG_AMA_DeepStrike.label: deep strike
LanguageData.UnknownCrashedShipPartCrash.label: Unknown Ship impact
LanguageData.UnknownCrashedShipPartCrash.letterText:
A large piece of an ancient Ship has crashed nearby.

It's mysterious influence will kill all plants in an expanding circle around itself.

Destroy it as soon as possible. But beware - it will probably defend itself.
LanguageData.StrangerInBlackJoin.label: man in black
LanguageData.StrangerInBlackJoin.letterText: Sensing trouble, a mysterious [PAWN_kind] has arrived.\n\nWill [PAWN_pronoun] be able to set things right in these parts?
LanguageData.OrbitalRecruiterArrival.label: orbital recruiter arrival
LanguageData.OrbitalMercenaryArrival.label: orbital mercenary arrival
